verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD רֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> Go down בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> and speak שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> there this word הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And say שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that sittest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you וַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> thou and thy servants וְעַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> and thy people הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> that enter בַּשְּׁעָרִ֥ים <S%H8179><s%> in by these gates הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> Execute מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> ye judgment וּצְדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness וְהַצִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> and deliver גָז֖וּל <S%H1497><s%> the spoiled מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand עָשׁ֑וֹק <S%H6216><s%> of the oppressor וְגֵר֩ <S%H1616><s%> to the stranger יָת֨וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֤ה <S%H490><s%> nor the widow אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֹּנוּ֙ <S%H3238><s%> and do no wrong אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּחְמֹ֔סוּ <S%H2554><s%> do no violence וְדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> innocent אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁפְּכ֖וּ <S%H8210><s%> neither shed בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if עָשׂוֹ֙ <S%H6213><s%> For if ye do תַּֽעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> indeed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> then shall there enter in בְשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> by the gates הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> of this house הַזֶּ֡ה <S%H2088><s%> of this מְלָכִים֩ <S%H4428><s%> kings יֹשְׁבִ֨ים <S%H3427><s%> sitting לְדָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כִּסְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne רֹֽכְבִים֙ <S%H7392><s%> riding בָּרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> in chariots וּבַסּוּסִ֔ים <S%H5483><s%> and on horses ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself [וְעַבְדָו כ] (וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> bondage ק) וְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> and his people

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בִּ֤י נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H7650><s%> I swear נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> by myself saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְחָרְבָּ֥ה <S%H2723><s%> shall become a desolation יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will become הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> that this house הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> house מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah גִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> Thou [art] Gilead אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you לִ֖י רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> unto me [and] the head הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲשִֽׁיתְךָ֙ <S%H7896><s%> [yet] surely I will make מִדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> thee a wilderness עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> [and] cities לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not [נֹושָׁבָה כ] (נֹושָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> abide ק)

וְקִדַּשְׁתִּ֥י <S%H6942><s%> And I will prepare עָלֶ֛יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against מַשְׁחִתִ֖ים <S%H7843><s%> destroyers אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against thee every one וְכֵלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> with his weapons וְכָֽרְתוּ֙ <S%H3772><s%> and they shall cut down מִבְחַ֣ר <S%H4005><s%> thy choice אֲרָזֶ֔יךָ <S%H730><s%> cedars וְהִפִּ֖ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> and cast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> [them] into the fire

וְעָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> shall pass גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> And many עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> by this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and they וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֨ה <S%H4100><s%> how long עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> done יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus לָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> thus unto this great הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> they

וְאָ֣מְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> Then they shall answer עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they עָֽזְב֔וּ <S%H5800><s%> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיַּעַבְדֽוּם׃ <S%H5647><s%> and served ס

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְכּ֣וּ <S%H1058><s%> Weep לְמֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> ye not for the dead וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּנֻ֖דוּ <S%H5110><s%> neither bemoan ל֑וֹ בְּכ֤וּ <S%H1058><s%> him [but] weep בָכוֹ֙ <S%H1058><s%> sore לַֽהֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> for him that goeth away כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> for he shall return ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Or וְרָאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> no more nor see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country מוֹלַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4138><s%> his native ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> touching שַׁלֻּ֨ם <S%H7967><s%> Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֜הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַמֹּלֵךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> which reigned תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> the place יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> instead of Josiah אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> which went forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> out of this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> He shall not return שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> in בִּמְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they הִגְל֥וּ <S%H1540><s%> whither they have led him captive אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> But he shall die וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and shall see עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again ס

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe בֹּנֶ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> unto him that buildeth בֵיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> his house בְּֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> by צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> unrighteousness וַעֲלִיּוֹתָ֖יו <S%H5944><s%> and his chambers בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> by wrong בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> [that] useth his neighbour's יַעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> service חִנָּ֔ם <S%H2600><s%> without wages וּפֹעֲל֖וֹ <S%H6467><s%> him not for his work לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and giveth לֽוֹ׃

הָאֹמֵ֗ר <S%H559><s%> That saith אֶבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> I will build לִּי֙ בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house מִדּ֔וֹת <S%H4060><s%> me a wide וַעֲלִיּ֖וֹת <S%H5944><s%> chambers מְרֻוָּחִ֑ים <S%H7304><s%> and large וְקָ֤רַֽע <S%H7167><s%> and cutteth him out לוֹ֙ חַלּוֹנָ֔י <S%H2474><s%> windows וְסָפ֣וּן <S%H5603><s%> and [it is] cieled בָּאָ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> with cedar וּמָשׁ֖וֹחַ <S%H4886><s%> and painted בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <S%H8350><s%> with vermilion

הֲתִֽמְלֹ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> Shalt thou reign כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you מְתַחֲרֶ֣ה <S%H8474><s%> because thou closest בָאָ֑רֶז <S%H730><s%> cedar אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> fathers הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eat וְשָׁתָ֗ה <S%H8354><s%> and drink וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> and do מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> for ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [and] then [it was] well לֽוֹ׃

דָּ֛ן <S%H1777><s%> He judged דִּין־ <S%H1779><s%> the cause עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> of the poor וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> then [it was] well הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> he הַדַּ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> [with him was] not this to know אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> me? saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> But עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> But thine eyes וְלִבְּךָ֔ <S%H3820><s%> and thine heart כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בִּצְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H1215><s%> [are] not but for thy covetousness וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood הַנָּקִי֙ <S%H5355><s%> innocent לִשְׁפּ֔וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> and for to shed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעֹ֥שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> and for oppression וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמְּרוּצָ֖ה <S%H4835><s%> and for violence לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> regard יְהוֹיָקִ֤ים <S%H3079><s%> concerning Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not יִסְפְּד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> They shall not lament ל֔וֹ ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> for him [saying] Ah אָחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brother וְה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> or Ah אָח֑וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not יִסְפְּד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> they shall not lament ל֔וֹ ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> for him [saying] Ah אָד֖וֹן <S%H113><s%> lord וְה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> or Ah הֹדֹֽה׃ <S%H1935><s%> his glory

קְבוּרַ֥ת <S%H6900><s%> with the burial חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> of an ass יִקָּבֵ֑ר <S%H6912><s%> He shall be buried סָח֣וֹב <S%H5498><s%> drawn וְהַשְׁלֵ֔ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast forth מֵהָ֖לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> beyond לְשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ס

עֲלִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> Go up הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> to Lebanon וּֽצְעָ֔קִי <S%H6817><s%> and cry וּבַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan תְּנִ֣י <S%H5414><s%> and lift up קוֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice וְצַֽעֲקִי֙ <S%H6817><s%> and cry מֵֽעֲבָרִ֔ים <S%H5682><s%> Abarim כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> are destroyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all מְאַהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H157><s%> for all thy lovers
